hero.description: I craft digital experiences that push boundaries. Full-stack developer specializing in React, Node.js, and creative web technologies.

about.title: About Me
about.p1: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with over 5 years of experience creating innovative digital solutions. My journey began with a curiosity for how things work on the web, and has evolved into a deep expertise in modern web technologies.
about.p2: I believe in the power of clean code, intuitive design, and seamless user experiences. Every project is an opportunity to push boundaries and create something truly exceptional.
about.name: Farid Hashemian
